column3: SEO Manager UK m f d
column11: Berlin Brands Group BBG has been designing producing and selling products in the home living consumer electronics sound light and sports categories since 2005 and is now one of Europe s largest digital companies BBG creates builds buys and scales consumer brands globally Our scalable infrastructure and profitable commercial model is driving hyper growth last year reporting 2020 revenues of 334M Our products are sold across channels including direct to consumer e commerce online marketplaces including Amazon and wholesale to retailers and distributors Our passion lies in kitchen appliances garden living sports and HiFi Our largest and best known brands are Klarstein auna blumfeldt and Capital Sports These are just a few examples within our portfolio of over 23 consumer product brands that is rapidly expanding as we welcome new brands to the group We distribute over 3 700 products to consumers in 28 countries worldwide BBG is now over 1 000 employees strong working in locations spanning the globe from Europe UK USA to Asia Our global headquarters are in Berlin Germany and we are now rapidly expanding our business We are scaling up and investing in world class logistics and fulfilment innovative digital marketing e commerce marketplace development and other sales channels To fuel this growth we are looking for talented and motivated colleagues like you to join us in shaping the DNA of BBG Your Responsibilities You constantly work on international keyword research content creation and on page optimization You contribute to improve SEO performance moving quickly to implement ideas and delivering results You analyze websites identify issues find root cause and experiment with solutions at scale in order to improve SEO performance and prove their effectiveness You do competitor analysis identify strategic opportunities and prioritize them to achieve a balance of the short term and long term performance You run the weekly monthly and quarterly performance review measuring and reporting on performance and running cause and effect analysis to derive action plans Your profile You have at least 2 years experience working in a dedicated SEO role You are data driven experienced using web analytics and Microsoft Office Package like Google Analytics Excel PowerBI You know how to use the SEO tools package like Google Search Console Keyword Planner Ahrefs SEMrush Screaming Frog You have the ability to effectively multi task in a deadline driven environment You are proactive and bring excellent project management skills needing minimal interference and micro management You are native English German and other languages is a plus You do have experience in HTML SQL Python Javascript OR CSS Definitely a big plus We offer An international marketing team that welcomes you and your ideasFlexible working hours and a modern office in the heart of Berlin Spittelmarkt Company benefits such as public transport ticket grant 30 discount on products from our own shop and employer s contribution to the company pension planDaily fresh fruits and vegetables as well as drinks and various health offers physiotherapy yoga and back training courses Opportunities for professional development language courses as well as team training and coachingAn international and dynamic working environment we celebrate success together at numerous company events JOIN THE GANG Become a member of one of Europe s leading ecommerce companies and fill out the online application below We are looking forward to your application Berlin Brands Group Wallstr 16 10179 Berlin www berlin brands group com

column3: JUNIOR SEO MANAGER F M D
column11: Our team needs more great colleagues Does the development and marketing of innovative natural hemp based products to help people stay in balance sound exciting to you Is working in a young ambitious company with a diverse team your thing Are you looking for a challenge in an exciting and growing market Then you ve come to the right place YOUR TERRAIN You support us in the planning and implementation of our new SEO strategy in close cooperation with external agenciesYou are responsible for the optimization of the SEO content in the webshops of our brands Vaay This Place and support other exciting projectsYou are responsible for the maintenance of the content in our Content Management System CMS You collaborate with internal e g Content Design Tech team and external stakeholdersYou conduct competition trend market analysis and derive target oriented measuresYou are responsible for monitoring evaluating relevant KPIs with common SEO tools like Google Search Console Google Analytics etc How You Convince Us You can identify yourself with our mission to revolutionize the European cannabis market and want to make your contributionYou have great German speaking and writing skills and English speaking skillsYou are a team player with an outcome oriented mindsetYou are passionate about the world of SEO and keep yourself up to date with the latest onsite and offsite optimization strategiesYou have successfully completed your studies in the field of marketing business communications business informatics media economics or a similar field of study You ideally have first experiences in the field of search engine optimizationYou ideally have first experiences with SEO toolsYou have ideally worked with a CMS beforeYou have strong conceptual analytical skills and are not afraid of numbers What You Can Look Forward To We provide flexible working hours in an innovative and agile working environmentWe cherish uncomplicated interaction with each other in flat hierarchies and with short decision pathsWe foster an open culture and agile way of working with a lot of space to create and develop ideasWe pay fair based on your qualifications and experienceWe provide internal and external development opportunities because stagnation means a step backwardsWe live an error culture with the motto Fail fast because mistakes make us better if we handle it transparently and learn from itWe organize team events for a lot of fun besides work What You Should Know Sanity Care GmbH with its two brands VAAY and This Place is the B2C unit of the fast growing cannabis start up Sanity Group based in Berlin The brands of Sanity Care GmbH develop and sell lifestyle and cosmetic products based on natural cannabinoids such as CBD and other herbal ingredients VAAY for example stands for CBD and hemp based products to promote mindfulness balance and well being as part of a healthy lifestyle This Place is the functional natural cosmetics brand with natural wellness and beauty products Our goal is to harness the full potential of the cannabis plant and to explore and harness more cannabinoids other than CBD in the future SOUNDS GOOD We are looking forward to receiving your application

column3: Senior SEO Manager m f d BM21_720
column11: We are looking for a SEO Manager m f d who will drive the SEO performance for all of our company s web properties and contribute to our growing customer base In this role you will directly report to our CMO The role is based in Berlin What You Will Do You deliver the search engine optimisation strategy and execute the SEO roadmap for all web properties German English Spanish future launches You own all aspects of on page optimization and manage the creation of pages via CMSYou work closely with internal and external key stakeholders to drive SEO best practices and strategyYou identify and implement content marketing opportunities within our outreach strategy and liaise with external partner agenciesYou measure performance of SEO content projects and create reports detailing the impacts madeYou recognise and recommend on opportunities for automating processesYou continuously improve SEO processes to ensure work is delivered efficiently and timely What You Should Bring You gained 3 years of SEO experience agency background is a plusYou offer a great research knowledge regarding keywords link analysis and search engine results new search engine behaviours and in depth competition analysisYou have a deep knowledge of HTML CSSYou are able to interpret and analyze large amounts of complex data from multiple sourcesYou know how to prioritise requests efficiently and ensure that agreed deadlines are metYou are fluent in English German is a big plus About Moyyn Moyyn is AI based reverse job platform Once you apply to the platform you will be matched with several job offers from our clients and also get recommendations for various job offers If the clients find your profile interesting they will get in touch with you directly for interviews Apply once to the talent pool and get interviews from many companies directly We are recruiting candidates for this particular job as a recruiter for one of our partner platforms

communication prioritization and problem solving skillsExperience in making hard data informed decisions A B experimentation user testing data analysis competitors and market analysis defining metrics Ability to collaborate well with a cross functional team especially with the paid search experts website and content managersYou speak fluent English and have an excellent attention to detail German language skills are a plus but not mandatory

across Search networks rolled at an international scaleHaving responsibility for various markets where Delivery Hero operatesCommunicating clearly with key stakeholders around day to day business column3: Search Engine Optimization SEO Manager f m x
column11: Company Description Our pioneering team of marketing experts uses data driven insights to run efficient performance marketing and improve the customer journey We operate all acquisition marketing and conversion optimization activities fully in house giving you the best environment for a steep learning curve A creative mind that meets analytical skills Hands on mentality paired with strategic thinking Our Organic Marketing Team is looking for a new team member Be part of an ambitious international and performance driven team that helps us generate a multi million turnover on our e commerce platform and attract several million users Be part of the success and leave your mark as our new Search Engine Optimization SEO Manager What You Will Tackle You are responsible for the implementation of our overall SEO strategy including on page off page and technical optimization as part of our consumer brands Collaborate closely with our content team and other marketing stakeholders to use the knowledge exchange between marketing teams in order to improve your area of responsibility to grow organic traffic constantly and ensure increasing conversion rates Prepare and analyse high quality performance reports containing conversions user behaviour ranking development and build a proper action plan based on itDevelop sophisticated ideas to enlarge and develop the platform based on keyword competitor and market research which you challenge according to business goals and monitor the results after implementationIdentify potential partner websites and support the attraction in cooperation with PR to develop high quality content What You Are Good At You have at least 2 years of SEO experience Strong analytical mindset and the ability to solve problems in a structured way backed by dataVery good understanding of actual SEO ranking factors techniques and experience with analysis tools like Google Analytics Search Console Sistrix ideally you have experience in HTML CSSYou are a communicative creative and performance driven team player with a hands on mentalityFluency in English and another European language like Dutch German or French Why AUTO1 Group Once a unicorn now a listed public company be part of our success story We invest in your personal and professional growth with a dedicated education budget for online courses conferences and trainingsMore than 70 different nationalities make up for a truly international and diverse working environmentWe offer discounts on well known brands like Flaconi Bosch Apple and Sky as well as special offers on used cars for you your family and your friendsLife work balance is part of our culture you will receive 30 days of vacation and can work from home up to 5 days a weekWe offer you a secure job with a permanent contract Apply by uploading your CV with a note of your salary expectations Contact Jennifer Ullrich 49 30 2016 38 2050 AUTO1 Group is Europe s leading digital automotive platform As a dynamic tech company we are revolutionizing the automotive industry with our brands wirkaufendeinauto de AUTO1 com and Autohero Our strong team of 4 200 people is dedicated to making Europe wide car trading and transport as fast and stress free as possible for our customers Grow personally and shape the future of car trading with us At AUTO1 Group we live an open culture believe in direct communication and value diversity We welcome every applicant regardless of gender ethnic origin religion age sexual identity disability or any other non merit factor

column3: Content Marketing Lead m f d
column11: We are JOIN www join com Europe s fastest growing HR Tech company with over 12 000 clients in the DACH region and over 10 000 candidates applying through our software every day Our ambition is to change the way companies hire on a global scale Still fully bootstrapped with 30 hyper motivated employees we are now looking for a Product Marketing Manager to level up our game strengthen our product marketing team in Berlin and support our strong growth and vision to become Europe s largest and greatest talent attraction software Your ambition is to set a global standard in user scale and software quality to build the leading talent attraction software for users across geographies industries and functions Although our SaaS offers a broad value scope it can be implemented with low effort is easy to use and has a beautiful design users love Tasks You define the content strategy together with the Marketing Team Lead and the foundersYou ensure consistent excellence in content quality across multiple owned and operated platforms e g website social media newsletter You own Content Marketing SEO Website and Landing Page Optimization and Editorial Management acting as a Product Manager for Content Marketing across the organizationYou champion product messaging across marketing support sales and leadership to present new and prospective customers with a consistently fantastic experience You lead the content team workflow and make sure that the deadlines are met as well as the expected quality of the contentYou become an expert on our product market competitors and customers You partner closely with product management and product teams to craft a repeatable playbook for feature releases You develop messaging and go to market strategies for new products plans and audiences You manage the planning project management and execution of integrated marketing campaigns You interact with customers to understand their ambitions needs and pain points and devise creative solutions to help them be more successful You create high quality marketing collateral with a team of talented designers and developers this includes landing pages marketing videos case studies product tutorials webinars and of course presentations Requirements You are a proven project manager with experience in uniting cross functional teammates under one common goalYou bring in depth knowledge of content development creation processes e g creative briefs setting realistic turnaround times for creative projects developing and maintaining brand and other standards You ensure consistent excellence in content quality across multiple owned and operated platforms e g website social media newsletter You bring experience in using metrics to establish validate and iterate on your content strategy You should have comfort and experience using content metrics particularly those related to lead generation and top of funnel awarenessYou are a strategic thinker who can develop testable hypotheses and doesn t believe in marketing for marketing s sakeYou are a strong communicator who can create consensus on plans projects and big ideas and feels comfortable presenting in front of a virtual roomYou geek out on productivity collaboration and design software and have strong opinions loosely held on how great products are marketed You have experience marketing a B2B SaaS product and understand the basics of product led growthYou have a talent for storytelling and a passion for clear persuasive copy You are comfortable turning technical documentation into approachable easy to understand instructions You can quickly switch gears between full team collaboration and autonomous projects Benefits A strong involvement and the opportunity to bring yourself and your ideas throughout the company and thus help shape product and customer developments A diverse and highly motivated team in a dynamic environment Start up feeling flat hierarchies short decision making paths and an inspiring international working atmosphere Challenging tasks in our office in the heart of Berlin Mitte Prenzlauerberg Kulturbraurei The unique opportunity to help shape the revolution in recruiting at JOIN from an early stage of our company Sounds good Let us know why you re excited to work with us We look forward to hearing from you

column11: Back Market is the 1 marketplace for refurbished electronic devices in Europe and in the US leading the way in a shift towards a circular economy freeing the planet from electronic waste We are proud to sabotage new by connecting highly certified professionals to consumers who are looking for a more affordable reliable and an ecological alternative to purchasing brand new products Back Market is undergoing meteoric growth and has raised over 434M already We have the objective of reaching 650 Back Makers or Saboteurs by the end of 2021 We are thrilled to have an inclusive fulfilling and caring work environment in all our offices Paris Bordeaux New York Prague Berlin and Tokyo This is an opportunity for you to join a talented humble and passionate team at the heart of innovation Be a part of the movement Join the refurb revolution The SEO Project Manager is a hands on position You will work both independently and with team members your mission will be to apply best in class SEO optimization to rank our websites on top of Google Results and our brand in our consumers hearts You ll be in charge of implementing our SEO strategy locally to increase our visibility and drive more organic traffic You ll also be part of an exciting highly skilled SEO team that provides a high level experience in managing organic search optimization with in house software programs and at worldwide scale YOUR MISSION IF YOU ACCEPT IT Fully manage SEO visibility in the UK and activate all actions to get maximum visibilityWork with our SEO team to define strategies that can increase our visibility and grow our businessConduct semantic audits to detect ranking opportunitiesCreate a Content Calendar that fits our audience s demandCreate and optimize our SEO content in order to improve organic trafficCreate partnerships with publishers and influencers to grow our popularitySet up and proactively manage projects that align with our strategic goalsEffectively track prioritize manage and report on deliverables assignments and issues related to each projectParticipate in weekly progress meetings to discuss our worldwide strategy and share key learnings with our worldwide teamParticipate in our Content Strategy Council to identify our best opportunitiesLead content agencies to get the best value they can provide in the execution of tasks and processes ensuring quality and deadline adherenceYOU ARE IN THE RIGHT PLACE IF You are a native English speakerYou ve graduated with a Bachelor or Master degree in a Business or a Marketing related fieldYou have 5 years of experience in SEO focused project management ideally in a marketing team or at a digital services agencyYou have knowledge of SEO in both content and link building strategiesYou have experience leading multiple projects in a fast paced environmentYou have the ability to analyze interpret and present data meaningfullyYou demonstrate great written and verbal communication skills with an emphasis on clarity and accuracyYou are an expert working with Google Search Console Ahrefs Google Analytics Screaming Frog working knowledge of HTML and content management systems including WordPress is a plus RECRUITMENT PROCESS Phone interview with Billy our Talent Acquisition SpecialistInterview with Hafid our Director of Organic GrowthInterview with André our SEO Project Manager US Brian our Traffic Manager UKInterview with Guillaume our Chief Marketing OfficerInterview with Thibaud our CEOWHY SHOULD YOU JOIN US A meaningful job through hard work you will help avoid thousands of tons of electronic waste and fight against planned obsolescence It counts An attractive salary equity multiple benefits meal tickets health insurance etc parental benefits relocation package internal events etc Be in an environment where you can make a difference you will have the freedom to innovate and adopt new ideas Grow your career with a flexible career path Back Market can help you evolve A booming scale up our environment is rapidly growing in Europe the USA and in Asia We embrace work life balance which includes flexible working hours and the opportunity to work from home A lot of fun you will have the opportunity to work in a fast paced open minded and friendly environment Back Market is an Equal Opportunity Employer for any minority disability gender identity or sexual column3: Senior SEO Manager d f m
column11: Our story Every year millions of people are either filing their taxes in fear or giving up on their tax refund altogether We re working on fixing that Our intuitive app enables anyone regardless of education or background to file their taxes with newfound confidence Spread across Berlin and Madrid Team Taxfix is a compassionate group of solution finders We speak our minds openly and with 350 professionals from 45 different nationalities we re rich in ideas and voices In four years we ve raised over 100 million euros in funding and helped people reclaim more than 900 million euros Your challenge As our Senior SEO Manager within the Content Team you ll have the opportunity to help shape the future of SEO strategy at Taxfix Reporting to our Content Lead and collaborating with stakeholders across the organisation you ll implement your vision to drive organic growth and help bring Taxfix and tax filing empowerment to the masses Your responsibilities Full ownership of the SEO channel s strategy and execution Work with content lead to develop SEO targets and report on progress to key cross functional stakeholders Drive growth through SEO content working with internal teams in local markets to optimise keyword performance Conduct keyword research to define high potential video content and optimise YouTube SEO performance and Google video visibility Monitor and improve domain authority via link marketing activities working with agencies in our various markets Work closely with engineering to monitor and improve our site speed and website architecture Work closely with engineering and analytics teams to automate SEO content production processes wherever possible Your profile 3 5 years of experience with SEO and content marketing in a high growth environment Experience with the full range of SEO disciplines from on page and technical SEO to off page SEO Experience with SEO tools Analytics Search Console Searchmetrics Sistrix Ahrefs Screaming Frog etc Experience working with stakeholders and agencies to achieve your goals and objectives Experience working with product and engineering to define and scope complex technical projects like page speed improvements Experience with YouTube SEO is considered a plus Fluent in English with a basic understanding of German Knowledge of French and Italian is considered a plus Why Taxfix A chance to do meaningful people centric work with an international team of passionate professionals Holistic wellbeing with free mental health coaching sessions yoga and a discounted membership to Urban Sports Club A monthly allowance to spend on home support services including childcare housekeeping pet sitting tutoring and elderly care Employee stock options for all employees because everyone deserves to benefit from the success they help to create Dedicated relocation and visa support for those that need it Choose to work from home or our modern office when needed plus healthy drinks and snacks when you do come in 27 annual vacation days and flexible working hours Full trust to take ownership of your work in a flat hierarchy where feedback is encouraged and expected A generous learning budget to support your personal and professional development and guidance from our internal L D experts Work from abroad for up to one month every year Just align with your team and then enjoy your trip Plenty of opportunities to socialise as a team In addition to internal meetups our international team hosts regular get togethers virtually and in person when possible Free tax declaration filing of course through the Taxfix app and internal support for all personal tax related questions Have a four legged friend in your life We re happy to have dogs join us in the office Excited So are we Learn more about Team Taxfix on our blog and get a glimpse of our culture below At Taxfix we believe that incredible things happen when you have a wealth of perspectives and experiences We re proudly committed to equal employment and development opportunities no matter your gender race religion age sexual orientation colour disability or place of origin To help mitigate any potential unconscious biases we ask that you refrain from including your picture age or marital status on your CV Let your experiences speak for themselves Not sure if you meet all the requirements for this role Please apply anyways You might bring something special to the team that we hadn t previously considered

column11: In This Role You Will Play a key role in improving organic traffic to n26 com leading the optimisation of English content on the global site Apply global SEO mindset with clear localisation impact working with Local SEO Specialists Main SEO point of contact for global initiatives ie product launches or new features Drive the global SEO content calendar both identifying global opportunities and topics leveraging content ideas from local teams and coordinating publication calendar Ability to find the right keywords and search terms in English and define precise SEO briefings to work either internally or with agencies Manage the workflow and projects with global SEO content agencies including quality control and local implementations as well as projects with internal teams product marketing design website Data skills to pull the data analyse onpage performance and execution mindset to suggest and implement improvements Provide global support and assistance to local SEO specialists when requested as well as extending SEO knowledge to other teams Solid knowledge of off page and Tech SEO and how they work together and improve on page What You Need To Be Successful You have a Bachelor s Degree from a respected university Master s preferred You have 4 years experience in international SEO ideally for a consumer rather than a business target You have a solid combination of strong analytical skills project planning and execution mindset Presentation skills are also a plus Experience working with SEO tools such as ahrefs Google Analytics and Google Search Console as well as content management systems and G Suite products You have the capacity to identify content opportunities and define editorial calendars You have fluent English speaking skills Any knowledge of other core N26 languages German French Italian or Spanish is a plus Ideally you have some previous experience in ASO and YouTube organic optimization SQL knowledge is a plus but not essential You have self initiative but a strong team spirit and can work efficiently in a fast paced dynamic environment Traits Actively help yourself and others be successfulContinuously learn and challenge the status quoThink globally act locallyStrong bias for actionGive and receive open direct and timely feedback What s In It For You Accelerate your career growth by joining one of Europe s most talked about disruptors and a LinkedIn Germany Top Startup Employer three years running Personal development budget discounted public transit pass German language classes fitness memberships childcare services N26 premium bank card employee loans and your choice of a Mac or Windows laptop26 vacation days per year with an additional day for each year of service up to 30 daysA high degree of collaboration and autonomy while working with a group of diverse peers and access to cutting edge technologies A relocation package with visa support for those who need it Who We Are N26 has reimagined banking for today s digital world Technology and design empower everything we do and it s how we are building the global banking platform the world loves to use We ve eliminated physical branches paperwork and hidden fees for an elegant digital experience and supreme savings Giving people the power to live and bank their way is what gets us out of bed in the morning and inspires the work that we do Founded in 2013 N26 now has 7 million customers in 25 markets Our talented team works across 8 global offices in Berlin Barcelona Madrid Milan Paris Vienna New York and São Paulo Sound good Apply now for this position N26 is an equal opportunity employer and values diversity We do not discriminate on the basis of race religion color national origin gender sexual orientation age marital status or disability status
column13: ['Digital Marketing', 'Search Engine Optimization (SEO)', 'Google Analytics', 'Inbound Marketing', 'Microsoft Excel', 'Content Marketing', 'Microsoft Office', 'Adobe Lightroom', 'Team Leadership', 'Strategic Communications']

column3: SEO Manager Italy m f x
column11: Job Description When someone says Frog you don t think of a little green animal but instead you re inspired for your next analysis Then you ve found your position 0 We love SEO and have done so since our inception in 2000 Content is Queen King but technical and data challenges also wait for you It s not just with the SEO Team where you can philosophise about pagination but also with the CMO the CEOs and the SEO Tech Team If you re not fazed by large amounts of data and enjoy the challenge of complex tasks then you ve come to the right place About Your New Role As SEO Manager you are responsible for the conception and implementation of SEO projects that improve the idealo SEO performance with focus on our Italian domain idealo it On top of that you are also contributing to our global SEO strategy and roadmap You conduct keyword research and work on keyword cluster analysis which then allows you to set the content strategy together with the ITA content team You work closely with the ITA Management Team and the ITA Country Manager in order to create the overall strategy for idealo it Projects are not limited to the Italian market some of your initiatives extend to all idealo s 6 countries and come to life in cross functional teams Optimisations of our on page structure internal linking landing pages and search engine crawling also belong to your responsibilities You monitor and evaluate SEO performance come up with concepts tests to improve it and manage the projects from start spec to finish QA evaluation Job requirements Skills Requirements SEO is your passion and it s backed up by 2 or more years of professional experience You have already gained experience in technical SEO analysis and reporting and have an understanding of ranking factors for Google s algorithm You have SEO tool knowledge Screaming Frog Sistrix Searchmetrics ahrefs Search Console or similar tools You are adept at using Excel and have a keen eye for data Knowledge of SQL and other databases is also advantageous You are fluent in Italian and in English German is a plus not a must Understanding of HTML CSS is a plus Your benefits at idealo More than 1200 motivated colleagues from 40 nations Welcome to Berlin our new headquarter with its outstanding modern architecture and light flooded offices is located close to the former Berlin Wall in the center of what used to be the heart of Berlin s news and publishers economy Family friendliness based on deep conviction including flexible working hours remote work options and 30 vacation days per year So happy We have been named Germany s best employer in the Internet multimedia sector for the second year in a row Source Focus Business 01 2021 issue dated 19 02 2021 About Idealo idealo is a Berlin success story in 2000 we started out with the mission of helping consumers make the best purchasing decisions Right in the heart of Berlin over 1 000 employees from 40 nations are working on the future of online shopping We focussing on agile and self reliant work sustainability and a healthy relationship between work and private life These values are firmly anchored in our corporate culture and an integral part of our corporate philosophy As part of our team you can look forward to freedom an international and inspiring working environment Your ideas are particularly important to us Not only our product portfolio is diverse but also the people who work on it We want you just as you are Origin religion gender sexual orientation or a severely handicapped degree do not play a role Information for applicants with severe disabilities As an applicant with a severe disability you can get advice from our Severely Disabled Representation SBV during the application process idealo continues hiring during the COVID 19 pandemic We do still hire great talent from around the world Due to the ongoing COVID 19 pandemic we are checking almost every day with the authorities if and how we can relocate talent from EU and non EU countries to work with idealo Please bear in mind that we will take individual decisions in close consultation with the applicant and the authorities
column13: ['Search Engine Optimization (SEO)', 'Microsoft Office', 'Research', 'Cascading Style Sheets (CSS)', 'Microsoft Excel', 'Microsoft PowerPoint', 'Teamwork', 'Windows', 'Social Media Marketing', 'Solar Energy']

column11: UXCam is the market leader in experience analytics enabling organizations to truly see how users are experiencing their mobile applications Brands such as Delivery Hero Rappi Costa Coffee and Virgin Mobile are already using UXCam to deliver the best digital experiences and drive amazing business results UXCam is loved by teams across Product UX Development and Support helping them create the optimal experience for their users Behind our market leading solution and our success are the people and their smart work driving this hyper growth trajectory If you enjoy challenges meaningful work and an opportunity to develop your career in a tech space ripe for disruption then UXCam is the company you are looking for As our Senior SEO Manager within the Content Team you ll have the opportunity to help shape the future of SEO strategy at UXCam Reporting to our Content Lead and collaborating with stakeholders across the organization you ll implement your vision to drive organic growth and help bring and keep UXCam in front of our target audience on search engines Your responsibilities Take full ownership of our SEO strategy and executionWork with content growth marketing and other teams to develop SEO targets and report on progress to key cross functional stakeholders Drive growth through SEO content working with the content team to optimize keyword performanceDevelop sophisticated ideas to enlarge and develop UXCam s organic search visibility based on keyword competitor and market research and monitor the results after implementationMonitor and improve domain authority via link building activities and identify potential new partner websiteWork closely with the web team to monitor and improve our site speed and website architectureWork closely with the growth marketing lead to automate SEO content production processes wherever possiblePrepare and analyze high quality performance reports containing conversions user behavior ranking development and build a proper action plan based on it Your profile You have at least 2 years of experience in SEO managementYou have experience with the full range of SEO disciplines from on page and technical SEO to off page SEO You have a very good understanding of actual SEO ranking factors techniques and experience with analysis tools like Google Analytics Search Console Sistrix aHrefs or SEMRush ideally you have experience in HTML CSSStrong analytical mindset and the ability to solve problems in a structured way backed by dataExperience working with stakeholders and third parties to achieve your goals and objectives Experience working with web and product teams to define and scope complex technical projects like page speed improvements Experience with YouTube SEO is considered a plus Fluent in English
column13: ['Search Engine Optimization (SEO)', 'Social Media Marketing', 'Digital Marketing', 'Team Leadership', 'Microsoft Office', 'Search Engine Marketing (SEM)', 'Google Ads', 'Project Management', 'Research', 'Public Speaking']

column11: Vinted is Europe s biggest pre loved fashion marketplace with 45 million members in 15 countries We want to make second hand the first choice worldwide A team of over 1000 people from Vinted s offices in Vilnius Berlin Prague Amsterdam and Utrecht develop and support our platform We share a unique work culture that s based on aiming high taking ownership co creating caring and growth Vinted is committed to building an inclusive workplace where people from all walks of life feel a sense of belonging We welcome applications from all suitably qualified persons regardless of their race colour national origin citizenship sex gender identity sexual orientation religion beliefs disability or age We truly believe when we can be fully ourselves we work better You ll become a part of the Digital Marketing domain which is focused on digital marketing channels such as SEO ASO influencers and paid media etc All our decisions are numbers based and are dedicated to acquiring new users via desktop and app You will report to Unpaid marketing channels team lead and frequently work together with the ASO manager In This Position You ll Run continuous A B tests to optimise conversion ratesPerform keyword research implementation and analysis for organic growthReport ASO results and achievements to internal stakeholdersWork cross functionally with design copywriter product and other teams to create a cohesive app store presence Keep up with the latest ASO and mobile marketing trends About You Have at least 1 year of experience with ASOA basic understanding of performance marketing on mobile devicesWilling to learn new skillsComfortable working with dataAttention to detailExcellent at communicating in spoken and written EnglishAdvantage Experience working with AppTweak or other ASO tools Work Perks Opportunity to join our stock options programmeLearning budget 13 2 from net yearly salary in Vilnius 10 from gross yearly salary in Berlin 25 days of holidays for Vilnius 30 days for BerlinRemote workout classesMental and emotional health support from MindleticPrivate health insurance Vilnius office A canteen that serves homemade food at friendly Vilnius office A daily allowance for ordering lunch Berlin office Monthly team building eventsA personal budget for shopping on VintedWork anywhere in the EU for 90 days out of the yearDog friendly officeHome office support IT workstation equipment provided a personal budget of up to 540 for home workplace furniture We now use a hybrid workplace model at Vinted This means that you ll spend Tuesdays and Wednesdays working from the office and for the remainder of your time you ll be able to choose between either working from home or the office The salary range for this position is 2490 2930 gross per month for the Vilnius office depending on level of experience If this sounds interesting you may well be just who we need Apply before October 11th 2021 and we ll be in touch we ll be in touch

column11: In this Berlin based role as a Local SEO Manager for Hungary and Romania you will focus on developing Zalando as the starting point for fashion in the search results by providing excellent SEO optimization for these two upcoming Zalando markets You will manage all local SEO marketing activities with the aim to strengthen the Zalando organic customer acquisition in your markets and drive organic search traffic to the Zalando website You will join a highly skilled and motivated SEO team of 20 colleagues which consists of global and local SEO managers as well as backend developers Together we drive the SEO topic within Zalando on all levels As a local SEO manager you will also work closely with other marketing channels to help support and leverage local initiatives from an SEO point of view WHERE YOUR EXPERTISE IS NEEDED Responsible for SEO optimization performance in Hungary Romania Implement local SEO related activities including on page optimization text content website structure etc and off page collaborations Act on performance reports and deploy global projects or SEO best practices in your local markets Discover local customer centric SEO opportunities on a keyword level to enable a continuous growth of organic traffic Work closely with content agencies to ensure Zalando customers experience highest quality localised content on the website Monitor local competitors in terms of SEO initiatives and organic visibility Share newly identified strategies with peers to leverage knowledge on company level Bring SEO initiatives and requirements to the global SEO team WHAT WE RE LOOKING FOR Minimum 2 years experience in SEO relevant marketing activities preferably in an e Commerce or agency environment Degree in marketing fashion communication or other relevant fields Excellent language skills in either Hungarian or Romanian Copywriting skills in the context of SEO content quality assurance Good knowledge in SEO tools Google Search Console Sistrix SemRush Searchmetrics Google Analytics Screaming Frog etc Basic technical understanding of website structure and HTML Experience of working with CMS tooling Experience in collaborating with external agencies Strong Excel knowledge with great analytical and reporting skills Good communication skills and be a passionate advocate of SEO in your environment Some experience in ASO is a plus PERKS AT WORK A workplace run on trust empowerment and feedback positive inspiring working atmosphere Competitive salary employee share shop 40 Zalando shopping discount discounts from external partners centrally located offices public transport discounts municipality services great IT equipment flexible working times additional holidays and volunteering time off free beverages and fruits diverse sports and health offerings Mentoring and personal development opportunities and an international team of experts Relocation assistance for internationals PME family service and parent child rooms We celebrate diversity and are committed to building teams that represent a variety of backgrounds perspectives and skills All employment is decided on the basis of qualifications merit and business need About Zalando Zalando is Europe s leading online platform for fashion connecting customers brands and partners across 20 markets We drive digital solutions for fashion logistics advertising and research bringing head to toe fashion to more than 42 million active customers through diverse skill sets interests and languages our teams choose to use Please note that all applications must be completed using the online form we do not accept applications via email
